clinical_study.brief_title: Trial in Non-cystic Fibrosis Bronchiectasis Patients With Chronic Lung Infections Treated With Colistimethate Sodium (PROMIS-2)
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multi-centre, Clinical Trial to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of 24 Months of Therapy With Inhaled Colistimethate Sodium in the Treatment of Subjects With Non-cystic Fibrosis Bronchiectasis Chronically Infected With Pseudomonas Aeruginosa (P. Aeruginosa)
